title: How do we leave lockdown?
text: With more than a third of the world living under covid-19 restrictions, it is time to decide what happens next, reports Graham Lawton.
abstract: With more than a third of the world living under covid-19 restrictions, it is time to decide what happens next, reports Graham Lawton.

similar.title: Men hit harder by covid-19.
text: From lifestyle to immune system differences, there are a number of reasons why men may be more affected by covid-19, reports Graham Lawton.
abstract: From lifestyle to immune system differences, there are a number of reasons why men may be more affected by covid-19, reports Graham Lawton.

similar.title: Coronavirus diaries: taking leave, but not holiday.

similar.title: When is it safe to ease lockdowns?
text: When is it safe to ease lockdowns?
Contact tracing and a low number of new cases are crucial before lifting coronavirus restrictions, reports Jessica Hamzelou.
abstract: Contact tracing and a low number of new cases are crucial before lifting coronavirus restrictions, reports Jessica Hamzelou.

similar.title: What happens next?
text: The novel coronavirus that emerged in Wuhan has exploded worldwide. What happens if it goes pandemic? Debora MacKenzie reports.
abstract: The novel coronavirus that emerged in Wuhan has exploded worldwide. What happens if it goes pandemic? Debora MacKenzie reports.
